tool_description: Monitors certificate validity periods, expiration dates, and provides alerts for certificates approaching expiration to ensure continuous signing capability.

certificate_path.description: Path to certificate file to monitor

warning_days.description: Days before expiration to trigger warning

error_messages: Certificate not found: Cannot locate certificate file at specified path.
Invalid certificate format: Certificate file format is not recognized or is corrupted.
Certificate already expired: The certificate has already passed its expiration date.
usage: Provide certificate_path to monitor expiration status. Set warning_days to configure advance notification threshold. Returns detailed validity timeline information.

days_until_expiry.description: Number of days until certificate expires

warning_triggered.description: Whether expiration warning threshold is reached
